  • Method Details

    • getMinecraftTime

      long getMinecraftTime(World world)
      Get the current Minecraft time for the specified world.
      Parameters:
      world - The world for which to get the time.
      Returns:
      The current Minecraft time in ticks for the specified world.

    • getNormalTime

      String getNormalTime(World world)
      Get the normal time format for the specified world.
      Parameters:
      world - The world for which to get the time.
      Returns:
      The time in the format "years/months/days/hours/minutes" from 0 to now. Time is rounded to the nearest minute.

    • setFullTime

      void setFullTime(World world, int years)
      Set the full time for the specified world in years.
      Parameters:
      world - The world for which to set the time.
      years - The new time value in years.

    • addTime

      Add time to the specified world in years.
      Parameters:
      world - The world for which to add time.
      years - The amount of time to add in years.

      years - The amount of time to remove in years.
